introduction: This was the most challenging and rewarding project I've worked on so far :) At Ringling we are in charge of every aspect of the film, from concept to Animation..I still have a few things I want to fix and will probably post a fixed version in the future, but for now, Enjoy!Special thanks to Keith Osborn - my faculty advisor on the film, Billy Merritt my pre-production instructor and Jim McCampbell head of the computer animation department.Music by Erez Koskas, Sound edit by Ido Levran, and extra help by Matt Killian.
